definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Terrorists will not find a safe haven here.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子在这里将找不到安身之处。

sentences.english: This incident was not terrorist-related and there is no threat to the wider public.
sentences.chinese: 本事件与恐怖分子无关，不会对公众造成威胁。

sentences.english: Aleppo is very happy now that the terrorists have been defeated, so I gather.
sentences.chinese: 阿勒颇正为恐怖分子被打败而高兴。

sentences.english: Of course overreaction is what terrorists hope to provoke.
sentences.chinese: 当然过度反应恰恰就是恐怖分子希望看到的。

sentences.english: The settlers say terrorists hide among the trees.
sentences.chinese: 定居者说有恐怖分子藏在树丛里。

sentences.english: Many are believed to have been trained in overseas terrorist camps.
sentences.chinese: 许多人被人曾在海外的恐怖分子营地接受过训练。

sentences.english: The police found an arsenal of knives and guns in the terrorists' hideout.
sentences.chinese: 警方在恐怖分子的藏身地发现大批刀枪。

sentences.english: The terrorists' attack completely destroyed the twin towers in New York.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子的袭击彻底摧毁了纽约的双子塔。

sentences.english: The teerist kidnaps prime minister and asks government for five million ransom money .
sentences.chinese: 恐怖分子绑架了首相，并向政府要了五百万的赎金。

sentences.english: The terrorists who have a lot of military vessels at their disposal hijacked this watercraft .
sentences.chinese: 一些拥有美国海军装备的恐怖分子控制了该船。

sentences.english: The terrorists dragged her into a dark room and duffed her up.
sentences.chinese: 那些恐怖分子把她拖进一间黑暗的房间毒打了一顿。

sentences.english: They consider the tanuki to be terrorists?
sentences.chinese: 他们认为狸猫是恐怖分子？

sentences.english: The President said he wouldn't be blackmailed into agreeing to the terrorists' demands.
sentences.chinese: 总统说他不会因受恐怖分子的威胁而答应他们的要求。

sentences.english: Do they really think that America is going to think that Barack Obama is palling around with terrorists?
sentences.chinese: 他们真的认为美国人会相信奥巴马在结交恐怖分子么？

sentences.english: It would give terrorists a nuclear umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 它会给恐怖分子一把核保护伞。

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)
